tool_description: An API showing top 9 popular currencies rate
name: Top 9 Currencies Rate
title: Top 9 Currencies Rate

api_list.name: Get top 9 currencies rate
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back top 9 currencies rate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-9-currencies-rate.p.rapidapi.com/currency"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-9-currencies-rate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://top-9-currencies-rate.p.rapidapi.com/currency"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-9-currencies-rate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
